"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? gibt es wirklich keine gesetze, die uns vor dieser art von datendiebstahl schützen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation:

"why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? are there really no laws that protect us from this kind of data theft? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and selling personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. it questions the lack of effective laws and regulations in protecting individuals' personal information and raises concerns about the potential risks and consequences of such practices. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
